title: EAT IT AND I’ll PAY FOR IT!! (SOUR EDITION)
author: Carter Sharer
description:
🔥SHOP NOW!!🔥━► https://www.teamrar.com/ 

Carter Sharer just built the World's Tallest Trampoline Tower (https://youtu.be/wZ92QkMdoyE) But today Carer Share, Lizzy Capri, Ryan Prunty, Stove's Kitchen, Bailey Bagles Payne and Deniesse do an insane EAT IT AND I'll PAY FOR IT CHALLENGE: SOUR EDITION! That's right, TEAM RAR has done the Eat it and I'll Pay For It Fast Food edition, as well as Gummies, Chocolate (dark, milk and white), Fast Food (fries, burgers, chicken nuggets) and now one of the hardest challenges yet: SOUR CANDY!! From Sour Skittles and Fun Dips to Sour Punch Straws, Sour Patch Kids, Toxic Waste Warheads and Sour Pop Rocks, we ate it all!! Each category of sour food paid up to the ultimate: sour soda with a sour shot full of sour treats! This was way more sour than any of us expected. What's the most sour food you've ever eaten?? Were there any sour candies you think we should have tried? Comment below!!

❇️ MORE EPIC VLOGS ❇️

@FaZe Rug Eating the Worlds SOUREST Candy - SOUR CHALLENGE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_neEtThSBk
@Collins Key SOUREST GIANT CANDY IN THE WORLD CHALLENGE!!! Warheads Toxic Waste (EXTREMELY SOUR DIY EDIBLE FOOD) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ecn3sD6pgVI
@Amp World  EATING THE WORLD"S MOST SOUREST CANDY!!! | BEN AZELART VS JEREMY HUTCHINS https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c41xDf64lYU
@Matt Stonie Giant Sour Patch Kids Challenge x 2 (EXTREMELY SOUR) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yrp8kV6cGo

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
📷INSTAGRAM → @CarterSharer https://www.instagram.com/cartersharer/
📷INSTAGRAM → @OfficalTeamRAR https://www.instagram.com/officialteamrar/
📷INSTAGRAM → @LizzyCapri https://www.instagram.com/lizzycapri/
📘FACEBOOK → CARTER SHARER OFFICIAL https://goo.gl/WM7mBu

Subscribe to my channel! https://goo.gl/XjjCA8
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Business Inquiries: carter@nightmedia.co

WARNING: 
This video is only for entertainment purposes. Do not attempt to recreate any of the acts in this video, as they may be dangerous if not done correctly, and could result in serious injury. If you rely on the information portrayed in this video, you assume the responsibility for the results. Have fun, but always think ahead, and remember that every project you try is at YOUR OWN RISK.

This footage is property of Team RAR inc. and is not allowed to be repurposed without written consent from Team RAR inc. For any requests from media contact us at carter@nightmedia.co

localize.description:
https://www.teamrar.com/ 

Carter Sharerは世界で最も高いトランポリンタワーを建設したばかりですが（https://youtu.be/wZ92QkMdoyE）、今日はCareer Share、Lizzy Capri、Ryan Prunty、Stove's Kitchen、Bailey Bagles Payne、Deniesseが非常識なEAT IT AND I'll PAY FOR IT CHALLENGE: SOUR EDITIONを行いました! そうです、TEAM RARは「EAT IT AND I'LL PAY FOR IT」のファストフード編、グミ、チョコレート（ダーク、ミルク、ホワイト）、ファストフード（フライドポテト、ハンバーガー、チキンナゲット）、そして今までで最もハードなチャレンジの一つを行いました。SOUR CANDY!!! 酸っぱいスキットルやファンディップ、酸っぱいパンチストロー、サワーパッチキッズ、有毒廃棄物のウォーヘッド、酸っぱいポップロックスなど、私たちはすべてを食べました。酸っぱい食べ物のそれぞれのカテゴリーは、究極のものまで支払われました：酸っぱいソーダに、酸っぱいお菓子でいっぱいの酸っぱいショットです。これは誰もが予想していたよりもはるかに酸っぱいものでした。あなたが今まで食べた中で一番酸っぱい食べ物は何ですか？私たちが試すべきだったと思う酸っぱいキャンディーはありましたか？以下にコメントしてください!

❇️ もっと壮大なVlogを❇️。

@FaZe Rug Eating the Worlds SOUREST Candy - SOUR CHALLENGE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_neEtThSBk
@Collins Key SOUREST GIANT CANDY IN THE WORLD CHALLENGE!!!! Warheads Toxic Waste (EXTREMELY SOUR DIY EDIBLE FOOD) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ecn3sD6pgVI
Amp World EATING THE WORLD "MOST SOUREST CANDY! | ben azelart vs jeremy hutchins https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c41xDf64lYU
@Matt Stonie Giant Sour Patch Kids Challenge x 2 (EXTREMELY SOUR) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yrp8kV6cGo

localize.title: EAT IT AND I'LL PAY FOR IT!!! (SOUR EDITION)

localize.description:
🔥━━► https://www.teamrar.com/ 

Carter Sharer刚刚建造了世界上最高的蹦床塔（https://youtu.be/wZ92QkMdoyE），但今天Carter Share、Lizzy Capri、Ryan Prunty、Stove's Kitchen、Bailey Bagles Payne和Deniesse做了一个疯狂的EAT IT AND I'll PAY FOR IT CHALLENGE：SOUR EDITION! 没错，RAR团队已经完成了 "吃了它我就付钱 "的快餐版，以及软糖、巧克力（黑、奶、白）、快餐（薯条、汉堡、鸡块）和现在最难的挑战之一。酸味糖果！！。从酸味的Skittles和Fun Dips到酸味的Punch Straws、Sour Patch Kids、Toxic Waste Warheads和Sour Pop Rocks，我们都吃了! 每一类酸味食品都付出了最终的代价：酸味苏打水和充满酸味的饮料! 这比我们任何人的预期都要酸。你吃过的最酸的食物是什么？有什么你认为我们应该尝试的酸味糖果吗？请在下面评论！!

❇️更多史诗级的微博 ❇️

@FaZe Rug 吃世界上最酸的糖果 - SOUR CHALLENGE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_neEtThSBk
@Collins Key 世界上最酸的巨型糖果挑战！! Warheads Toxic Waste (extrEMELY SOUR DIY EDIBLE FOOD) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ecn3sD6pgVI
节目中的 "吃世界上最酸的糖果"！！！@Amp世界 吃世界上最酸的糖果 | Ben Azelart vs Jeremy Hutchins https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c41xDf64lYU
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yrp8kV6cGo @Matt Stonie 巨大的酸奶片儿童挑战赛 x 2 (非常酸) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yrp8kV6cGo

localize.title: 吃了它，我为它买单！！。(酸味版)

localize.description:
🔥━━► https://www.teamrar.com/ 

Carter Sharer剛剛建造了世界上最高的蹦牀塔（https://youtu.be/wZ92QkMdoyE），但今天Carter Share、Lizzy Capri、Ryan Prunty、Stove's Kitchen、Bailey Bagles Payne和Deniesse做了一個瘋狂的EAT IT AND I'll PAY FOR IT CHALLENGE：SOUR EDITION! 沒錯，RAR團隊已經完成了 "吃了它我就付錢 "的快餐版，以及軟糖、巧克力（黑、奶、白）、快餐（薯條、漢堡、雞塊）和現在最難的挑戰之一。酸味糖果！！。從酸味的Skittles和Fun Dips到酸味的Punch Straws、Sour Patch Kids、Toxic Waste Warheads和Sour Pop Rocks，我們都吃了! 每一類酸味食品都付出了最終的代價：酸味蘇打水和充滿酸味的飲料! 這比我們任何人的預期都要酸。你喫過的最酸的食物是什麼？有什麼你認爲我們應該嘗試的酸味糖果嗎？請在下面評論！!
